rules_text:
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Floating Ecocosm can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor_text:
[i]“Amazing, no? Worlds within worlds. Perhaps we know less about the sea than we would admit.”
—Henri Dieu-de-Fer[/i]
notes:
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
